main event: An observer reported a visual sighting of a lighted object moving rapidly across the sky during daylight on September 2, 1967, near Boulder, Colorado.
interesting points: The object was first spotted in the northeastern sky, moving towards the southwest at a 35-degree elevation., The sighting lasted approximately 1 minute before the object disappeared., The observer noted that it seemed to be searching for something, stopping several times during its movement., No physical evidence was recorded, though the observer mentioned the object occasionally emitting a low humming sound., The observation report lacks detailed visual descriptions.
